attributes.title: worst app!!
attributes.review: This app made my phone completely shut down every 5 minutes. It’s also drained my battery faster than Usain Bolt can run.

attributes.title: Kept glitching
attributes.review: Kept glitching wayyyy too much. Everytime I tried to open it it would crash so I just deleted it. Definitely earned a 1 star rating 👎🏾

attributes.title: TERRIBLE APP
attributes.review: I downloaded this app a week ago and ever since then everything in my life has gone wrong. I was walking down the stairs and a North Korean bomb flew into my house. Proceedingly, my phone microwaved itself!

attributes.title: GPS NOT GOOD
attributes.review: my pet stove tired to fry sum rice when it hopped away so we levitated in it’s direction and it ends up not ending. But we turn into a wall when the airplane just starts to fall so we slide up the ocean and then just got lost. HORRIBLE GPS.

attributes.title: No✨🧚
attributes.review: Absolutely hate it here. Can’t believe they can make an app this terrible. Right when I got to the app, it sensed I was Arab and immediately thought I could bomb the country. How rude!😔 jk I’m not pressed about it !!!😋😋😋😋

attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP
attributes.review: When I downloaded the app it told my McDonald’s chicken nuggets to kill them self’s. It was very sad so I  put them in therapy. Next it also told my teddy bear he was adopted from Build a bear. It was very hard to convince my teddy bear he was not. WORST APP EVERR!!

attributes.title: AWFUL
attributes.review: this app is so bad the second i downloaded it i got spam email to take surveys!!😤 not only did i get spam email but the FBI broke into my house and tried to kidnap me while i was sleeping!🤬😡😤 DO NOT RECOMMEND

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD
attributes.review: Do not and i mean DO NOT download this app!!! For one when it asked permission for my camera roll it took all of my n$des and shared them with my GRANDMOTHER!!! If that wasn't enough it started calling me all these racial slurs against Vietnamese people. Im white

attributes.userName: godd to use for tik tok edits
attributes.title: WORST APP EVERRR
attributes.review: This app ate my noodles and took my pet rock charlinda. If you download this app it will torcher you with a hairless orange that sounds like it has smoked its whole life. THIS APP IS TERRIBLE. Update I think there’s a stalker in their trying to see my photos?!?! I feel violated.

attributes.title: Horrible app!
attributes.review: This is the most horrible app I’ve ever seen/ downloaded. If you downloaded this, it is just a waist of time! I cannot believe they even designed this app. 😡🤬😠😤
